page.title: 17Police
page.content: {THE POLICE.}In Halifax,the most frequent crime is theft,but there are not many drunken drivers.There have been serious crimes in the past including murders and a riot in George Square in 1981.In the West Yorkshire Metropolitan Police,the highest possible rank is that of Chief Constable,but in Calderdale the highest rank is Chief Superintendant. The Calderdale division has been split up into 3 sub-divisions_Halifax, Brighouse,and Sowerby Bridge. The new police headquarters for Calderdale is being built at the bottom of Burdock Way.
